attributes.value: Has a negative view of those who exercise power over others
Finds artwork boring
Values self-control
Values a harmonious existence
Considers craftsmanship to be relatively worthless
Believes the idea of war is utterly repellent and would have peace at all costs
Is quick to anger
Is brave in the face of imminent danger
Has no confidence at all in her talent and abilities
Is pleased by her own appearance and talents
Is grateful when others help her out and tries to return favors
Presents herself modestly and frowns on any flashy accoutrements
Generally finds herself quite hopeful about the future
Tends to consider what others think of her
Often finds herself changing her mind to agree with somebody else
Forms only fleeting and rare emotional bonds with others
Has a profound sense of duty and obligation
Enjoys the company of others
Susceptible to disease
A little difficulty with words
A good spatial sense
A very bad sense of empathy
